Title: Reforging a Legend
Description:
There you are! Weaponsmith Koref was just looking for you. Left me with a note asking you to meet him in the Obsidian Conclave.

Sounds like you're helping him reforge an ancient titan key? Let me know how it goes! That's headline news if I ever heard it.
ObjectivesText: Seek out Weaponsmith Koref in the Obsidian Enclave.
